Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-65082 affecting package httpd for versions less than 2.4.66-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-65082 affecting package httpd for versions less than 2.4.66-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package httpd is earlier than 2.4.66-1, affected by CVE-2025-65082
